meanings.definition: The act or process of intertwining or interweaving.
meanings.sent1: The intetwinements of the threads created a strong fabric.
meanings.sent2: The intetwinements of the branches formed a beautiful canopy.
meanings.sent3: The intetwinements of the spaghetti on my fork made it look like a messy nest.
meanings.sent4: The intetwinements of fate brought them together in an unexpected way.
meanings.sent5: The intetwinements of the vines on the fence were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Things that are intertwined or interwoven.
meanings.sent1: The intetwinements of the ropes were strong and secure.
meanings.sent2: The intetwinements of the stories in the book were captivating.
meanings.sent3: The intetwinements of the flavors in the dish created a delicious blend.
meanings.sent4: The intetwinements of the relationships in the small town were complex.
meanings.sent5: The intetwinements of the roots in the forest floor created a dense network.
